title: The Ogallala Aquifer in the U.S. is being overused

content.prompt: Which of the following is true of the Ogallala Aquifer?

choices.label: It underlies the African Serengeti and supplies millions of people with freshwater.
It underlies the Argentine Pampas and is underutilized as a source of water.
It underlies eastern Quebec and is a limited source of freshwater.
It underlies the United States High Plains and is being depleted by overuse.
It underlies central Florida and is contaminated by pesticide and fertilizer runoff from farms.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe environmental concepts and processes.
